trans-unit.source: Manage Azure SQL Databases using Azure Automation
trans-unit.target: Manage Azure SQL Databases using Azure Automation

trans-unit.source: Learn about how the Azure Automation service can be used to manage Azure SQL databases at scale.
trans-unit.target: Learn about how the Azure Automation service can be used to manage Azure SQL databases at scale.

trans-unit.source: Managing Azure SQL Databases using Azure Automation
trans-unit.target: Managing Azure SQL Databases using Azure Automation

trans-unit.source: This guide will introduce you to the Azure Automation service, and how it can be used to simplify management of your Azure SQL databases.
trans-unit.target: This guide will introduce you to the Azure Automation service, and how it can be used to simplify management of your Azure SQL databases.

trans-unit.source: What is Azure Automation?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Automation?

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Automation</linkText><title></title></link> is an Azure service for simplifying cloud management through process automation.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Automation</linkText><title></title></link> is an Azure service for simplifying cloud management through process automation.

trans-unit.source: Using Azure Automation, long-running, manual, error-prone, and frequently repeated tasks can be automated to increase reliability, efficiency, and time to value for your organization.
trans-unit.target: Using Azure Automation, long-running, manual, error-prone, and frequently repeated tasks can be automated to increase reliability, efficiency, and time to value for your organization.

trans-unit.source: Azure Automation provides a highly-reliable and highly-available workflow execution engine that scales to meet your needs as your organization grows.
trans-unit.target: Azure Automation provides a highly-reliable and highly-available workflow execution engine that scales to meet your needs as your organization grows.

trans-unit.source: In Azure Automation, processes can be kicked off manually, by 3rd-party systems, or at scheduled intervals so that tasks happen exactly when needed.
trans-unit.target: In Azure Automation, processes can be kicked off manually, by 3rd-party systems, or at scheduled intervals so that tasks happen exactly when needed.

trans-unit.source: Lower operational overhead and free up IT / DevOps staff to focus on work that adds business value by moving your cloud management tasks to be run automatically by Azure Automation.
trans-unit.target: Lower operational overhead and free up IT / DevOps staff to focus on work that adds business value by moving your cloud management tasks to be run automatically by Azure Automation.

trans-unit.source: How can Azure Automation help manage Azure SQL databases?
trans-unit.target: How can Azure Automation help manage Azure SQL databases?

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Database can be managed in Azure Automation by using the <link><linkText>Azure SQL Database PowerShell cmdlets</linkText><title></title></link> that are available in the <link><linkText>Azure PowerShell tools</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL Database can be managed in Azure Automation by using the <link><linkText>Azure SQL Database PowerShell cmdlets</linkText><title></title></link> that are available in the <link><linkText>Azure PowerShell tools</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Azure Automation has these Azure SQL Database PowerShell cmdlets available out of the box, so that you can perform all of your SQL DB management tasks within the service.
trans-unit.target: Azure Automation has these Azure SQL Database PowerShell cmdlets available out of the box, so that you can perform all of your SQL DB management tasks within the service.

trans-unit.source: You can also pair these cmdlets in Azure Automation with the cmdlets for other Azure services, to automate complex tasks across Azure services and 3rd party systems.
trans-unit.target: You can also pair these cmdlets in Azure Automation with the cmdlets for other Azure services, to automate complex tasks across Azure services and 3rd party systems.

trans-unit.source: Azure Automation also has the ability to communicate with SQL servers directly, by issuing SQL commands using PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Azure Automation also has the ability to communicate with SQL servers directly, by issuing SQL commands using PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>Azure Automation runbook gallery</linkText><title></title></link> contains a variety of product team and community runbooks to get started automating management of Azure SQL Databases, other Azure services, and 3rd party systems.
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>Azure Automation runbook gallery</linkText><title></title></link> contains a variety of product team and community runbooks to get started automating management of Azure SQL Databases, other Azure services, and 3rd party systems.

trans-unit.source: Gallery runbooks include:
trans-unit.target: Gallery runbooks include:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Run SQL queries against a SQL Server database</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Run SQL queries against a SQL Server database</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Vertically scale (up or down) an Azure SQL Database on a schedule</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Vertically scale (up or down) an Azure SQL Database on a schedule</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Truncate a SQL table if its database approaches its maximum size</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Truncate a SQL table if its database approaches its maximum size</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Index tables in an Azure SQL Database if they are highly fragmented</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Index tables in an Azure SQL Database if they are highly fragmented</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.source: Now that you've learned the basics of Azure Automation and how it can be used to manage Azure SQL databases, follow these links to learn more about Azure Automation.
trans-unit.target: Now that you've learned the basics of Azure Automation and how it can be used to manage Azure SQL databases, follow these links to learn more about Azure Automation.
